Content:: Xavier Amorós i Solà (7 April 1923[1] – 18 July 2022) was a Catalan politician, poet, and writer.[2] He served as a member of the Senate of Spain from 1986 to 1992.[3] Solà died in July 2022 in Reus, at the age of 99.[2]  This article about a Catalan politician is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it. This article about a Catalan poet is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
